OctoPrint-ZERO

 OctoPrint-YouTubeLive   OctoPrint_FreeMobile-Notifier 

Configures compiling and install FirmWare for any 3D printer 30 in Sec.

Configures compiling and install FirmWare for any 3D printer in 30 Sec. plugins.octoprint.org/plugin/ZERO/

Pictures

Installation 
pip install "https://github.com/gkolozof/archive/master.zip"
